parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Document type as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: CommandTabCount
parameters.description: Number of CommandManager tabs for DocumentType

title: ICommandManager.IGetCommandTabs
description: Gets the CommandManager tabs for the specified document type.
signature:
CommandTab IGetCommandTabs( 
   System.Int32
DocumentType
,
   System.Int32
CommandTabCount
)

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Document type as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: CommandTabCount
parameters.description: Number of CommandManager tabs for DocumentType

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of CommandManager tabs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ICommandManager::GetCommandTabCount
to get the size of the array for this method.
